title: Is there a greatest common factor?
Is the polynomial a binomial, trinomial, or are there more than three terms?
Binomial
text: Since it's a binomial, check to see whether the expression is a sum or difference.

title: Check
text: If you are left with $$\left(k^2+4\right) \left(k^2-4\right)$$, look at the expression to see if you can further factor the expression. $$k^2-4$$ can be further factored!

title: Difference of squares again
text: $$k^2-4$$ is a difference of squares and can be furthered factored into $$\left(k+2\right) \left(k-2\right)$$.
